channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Deepak Sathya
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Deepak Sathya

item.title: Project 1: TensorFlow Speech Recognition
item.description: Predict the audio input (audio) files based on their frequencies. Speech data provided by Google Brains. Converted the audio files into frequencies (MFCCs) and used those frequencies along with their labels to predict the audio files. Also productionized this model using web-framework, FastAPI. This project might serve as a predecessor step before we implement natural language processing and use for further analysis About the Data: Data is available on World Wide Web.

item.title: Project 2: Health Insurance Fraud Detection
item.description: Predict the fraudulent claims by the healthcare providers. Analyzed the data and made joins and/or unions on the input sources. Performed Exploratory Data Analysis and identified the columns that are useful to predict the data and performed PCA & Hyper-parameter tuning to get 94% model accuracy using Random Forest classifier Sample EDA Correlation Final Predictions Link to GitHub Repository
